scripts.watch_test_b: nodemon  --ext js --exec "clear && printf '\e[3J' && tap testServicesNet/base.test.js --cov --color --reporter=spec || true"
scripts.watch_test: nodemon  --ext js --exec "clear && printf '\e[3J' && tap tests/*.test.js --cov --color --reporter=spec || true"
scripts.watch_debug_b: nodemon  --ext js  --cov --exec "clear && printf '\e[3J' && node --inspect   testServicesNet/base.test.js || true"
scripts.watch_debug_t: nodemon  --ext js  --cov --exec "clear && printf '\e[3J' && node --inspect   tests/transports.test.js || true"
